entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Snow or periods of ice pellets in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
